bibl.title: Dispatch from du Verge to J. C. Bancroft Davis
Despatches from United States consuls in St. Paul de Loanda, 1854-1893

correspAction.persName: Davis, J. C. Bancroft (John Chandler Bancroft), 1822-1907

revisionDesc.change: Creation of individual xml files, review, and addition encoding

div1.p:
United States Consulate
at St Paul de Loanda

L de R. du Verge
to Dept. of State

Encloses
Request and purpose for the same

opener.dateline:
United States Consulate
St. Paul de Loanda
Augt. 12th 1882

div1.p:
Sir
I have the honor most respectfully to request that blank forms and stationary send be forwarded to this consulate as soon as possible besides Eight U.S. Flags; Two one for consulate only for this consulate which is in need of the same, and six other for the Consular send agents on this coast, together with six Consular Regulations; for which this send consulate will be responsible.
I would also respectfully ask that another U.S. Coat of arms be forwarded send to me, as the old one is now unfit for use

closer.salute:
I have the honor to be Sir
Respectfully
Your obedient servant
closer.signed:
L de R. du Verge
U.S. Consul
